entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
